verses.verse: On that day, <S%H3117><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus <S%H325><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Haman, <S%H2001><s%> the Jews <S%H3064><s%>' enemy, <S%H6887><s%> to Esther <S%H635><s%> the queen. <S%H4436><s%> Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> came <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king; <S%H4428><s%> for Esther <S%H635><s%> had told what he was to her. <S%H5046><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> took off <S%H5493><s%> his ring, <S%H2885><s%> which he had taken <S%H5674><s%> from Haman, <S%H2001><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> it to Mordecai. <S%H4782><s%> Esther <S%H635><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> over the house <S%H1004><s%> of Haman. <S%H2001><s%>

Esther <S%H635><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> yet again <S%H3254><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> and fell down <S%H5307><s%> at <S%H6440><s%> his feet, <S%H7272><s%> and begged <S%H2603><s%> him with tears <S%H1058><s%> to put away <S%H5674><s%> the mischief <S%H7451><s%> of Haman <S%H2001><s%> the Agagite, <S%H91><s%> and his device <S%H4284><s%> that he had devised <S%H2803><s%> against the Jews. <S%H3064><s%>

She said, <S%H559><s%> "If it pleases <S%H2896><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> and if I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in his sight, <S%H6440><s%> and the thing <S%H1697><s%> seem right <S%H3787><s%> to <S%H6440><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> and I am pleasing <S%H2896><s%> in his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> let it be written <S%H3789><s%> to reverse <S%H7725><s%> the letters <S%H5612><s%> devised <S%H4284><s%> by Haman, <S%H2001><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hammedatha <S%H4099><s%> the Agagite, <S%H91><s%> which he wrote <S%H3789><s%> to destroy <S%H6><s%> the Jews <S%H3064><s%> who are in all the king <S%H4428><s%>'s provinces. <S%H4082><s%>

Write <S%H3789><s%> also to the Jews, <S%H3064><s%> as it pleases <S%H2896><s%> you, <S%H5869><s%> in the king <S%H4428><s%>'s name, <S%H8034><s%> and seal <S%H2856><s%> it with the king <S%H4428><s%>'s ring; <S%H2885><s%> for the writing <S%H3791><s%> which is written <S%H3789><s%> in the king <S%H4428><s%>'s name, <S%H8034><s%> and sealed <S%H2856><s%> with the king <S%H4428><s%>'s ring, <S%H2885><s%> may not be reversed by any man. <S%H7725><s%>"

Then the king <S%H4428><s%>'s scribes <S%H5608><s%> were called <S%H7121><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> in the third <S%H7992><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> Sivan, <S%H5510><s%> on the twenty <S%H6242><s%> - third day of the month; <S%H2320><s%> and it was written <S%H3789><s%> according to all that Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to the Jews, <S%H3064><s%> and to the satraps, <S%H323><s%> and the governors <S%H6346><s%> and princes <S%H8269><s%> of the provinces <S%H4082><s%> which are from India <S%H1912><s%> to Ethiopia, <S%H3568><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> - seven <S%H7651><s%> provinces, <S%H4082><s%> to every province <S%H4082><s%> according to its writing, <S%H3791><s%> and to every people <S%H5971><s%> in their language, <S%H3956><s%> and to the Jews <S%H3064><s%> in their writing, <S%H3791><s%> and in their language. <S%H3956><s%>

He wrote <S%H3789><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of King <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus, <S%H325><s%> and sealed <S%H2856><s%> it with the king <S%H4428><s%>'s ring, <S%H2885><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> letters <S%H5612><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> courier <S%H7323><s%> on horseback, <S%H5483><s%> riding <S%H7392><s%> on royal horses <S%H7409><s%> that <S%H327><s%> were bread <S%H1121><s%> from swift steeds. <S%H7424><s%>

on one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> in all the provinces <S%H4082><s%> of King <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus, <S%H325><s%> on the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> day of the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> which is the month <S%H2320><s%> Adar. <S%H143><s%>

A copy <S%H6572><s%> of the letter, <S%H3791><s%> that the decree <S%H1881><s%> should be given <S%H5414><s%> out in every province, <S%H4082><s%> was published <S%H1540><s%> to all the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> that the Jews <S%H3064><s%> should be ready <S%H6264><s%> for that day <S%H3117><s%> to avenge <S%H5358><s%> themselves on their enemies. <S%H341><s%>

So the couriers <S%H7323><s%> who rode <S%H7392><s%> on royal <S%H327><s%> horses <S%H7409><s%> went out, <S%H3318><s%> hastened <S%H926><s%> and pressed on <S%H1765><s%> by the king <S%H4428><s%>'s commandment. <S%H1697><s%> The decree <S%H1697><s%> was given <S%H5414><s%> out in the citadel <S%H1002><s%> of Susa. <S%H7800><s%>
